item.title: A Lesson from the Book of Mormon
item.description:
A Lesson from the Book of Mormon by undefined Vicki F. Matsumori, Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency given in Sunday Morning of 177th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2007
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Vicki F. Matsumori, Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency

item.title: Helping Others Recognize the Whisperings of the Spirit
item.description:
Helping Others Recognize the Whisperings of the Spirit by undefined Vicki F. Matsumori, Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 179th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2009
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
